Articles.Content: Hi my name is Stevan but u can call me Steve . I come from Serbia and i love your game at least demo because i can't buy full version coz we don't have a Paypal in Serbia. So i was wondering can someone help me buy a full copy of the game? Or can i buy it using Visa?

Hi stevelcf and welcome to the community

I'm glad you are enjoying the demo, but I am sorry to say that paypal is the only option currently, though KSP will be coming to Steam eventually.

If you can get a friend in another country to buy KSP for you he can give you the account he uses, and you can pay him back, that is the only way right now for people who can't use paypal.

You can only purchase through PayPal. You don't need a PayPal account though, they will accept any card that is part of the VISA or MASTERCARD network. Just click the link that says something like continue purchase without PayPal account. Of course, if PayPal itself is blocked in your country, there's nothing we can do. You might consider asking family or friends that live in a different country to help you.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Thanks for the info guys, i guess ill figure something out.
